meanings.definition: A game played on a large open-air course, in which a small hard ball is struck with a club into a series of small holes in the ground.
meanings.sent1: During the weekend, families enjoy playing gowfs together at the local course.
meanings.sent2: He practiced his swing at the driving range before heading out to play gowfs with his friends.
meanings.sent3: The gowfs tournament had a surprise guest appearance from a famous golfer.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in playing gowfs was like a skilled artist painting on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball hitting the hole made the gowfs experience even more exciting.

meanings.definition: A club with a wooden or metal head and a shaft with a grip, used in playing golf.
meanings.sent1: He carefully selected his gowfs before teeing off on the first hole.
meanings.sent2: The golfer's favorite gowfs had a comfortable grip that helped improve his swing.
meanings.sent3: The gowfs accidentally slipped out of his hand and landed in the water hazard.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of gowfs gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing her love for the sport.
meanings.sent5: The golfer's success was attributed to the quality of his gowfs and his dedication to practice.
